item.title: Biden bans offshore drilling across vast area of US
item.description: President Biden has announced a ban on offshore oil and gas drilling along most of America's coastline.

item.title: Justin Trudeau may quit within days, say Canadian media
item.description: The pressure has been building for months, with sinking poll numbers for the prime minister's ruling Liberal Party.

item.title: Hamas lists 34 hostages it may free under ceasefire
item.description: The list is released as new Israeli air strikes kill dozens in Gaza over the weekend.

item.title: Mozambique opposition leader says he will return home from exile
item.description: Venâncio Mondlane left Mozambique shortly before last October's elections, which he says he won.

item.title: 'Stressed' elephant gores Spanish tourist to death in Thailand
item.description: Blanca Ojanguren García was gored to death while bathing the animal.
